official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to the penalty for failure to declare articles valued at less than $50.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to make persons who fail to declare an article valued at less than $50 liable for a $50 fine and forfeiture of the article.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to the penalty for failure to declare articles valued at less than $50.
